name: Youtube Dark Comfort Red
description: Dark Style, with red accents. Should work on all pages of youtube. Please read the Notes below. Check out the blue version "Dark Comfort Blue"! https://userstyles.org/styles/112336/youtube-comfort-dark-blue
additional_info: The colored Progress bar only works on YouTube videos supporting the HTML5 video player. You must also have the HTML5 video player enabled on your YouTube account ( you can do that here ) Update (02 Marchy 2017): - Small Bug Fixes Update (19 July 2016): - Small Bug Fixes Update (15 Apr 2016): - Fixed Video Upload Manager Update (14 Apr 2016): - Fixed small changes in comments - Fixed Live-Chat (Thanks to Icculus575) Update (27 Mar 2016): - Fixed new like/dislike buttons Update (21 Feb 2016): - Small fixes Update (19 Feb 2016): - Fixed comment section - Minor changes Update (18 Sep 2015): - Changed location external images - Bugfixing Update (06 June 2015): - Fixed delete button in history - Fixed side bar bug in wide view on high resolutions - Recolored Like/Dislike button after change from YT Update (27 May 2015): - Fixed Wide View

discussions.name: "Remove from Watch History" button not visible
